author: Kevin Lincoln
title: Crowdfunding Boosts ‘Super Troopers 2’
text:
Since the 2001 release of “Super Troopers,” the five men who co-wrote and starred in the low-budget police comedy have watched it develop a cult following. So when Fox, which released the first one, said it wasn’t sure an audience existed for a sequel, the filmmakers decided to prove there was.
The five of them—Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Steve Lemme, Paul Soter, and Erik Stolhanske—started an Indiegogo campaign to raise money for “Super Troopers 2,” with the understanding that if they brought in $2 million or more,...
